channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- Pelco Sarix Professional V1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- Pelco Sarix Professional V1

item.title: CVE-2018-7782|2024-08-05T06:37:59.633Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional%20v1
item.description: In Schneider Electric Pelco Sarix Professional 1st generation cameras with firmware versions prior to 3.29.69, authenticated users can view passwords in clear text.

item.title: CVE-2018-7780|2024-08-05T06:37:59.878Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional%20v1
item.description: In Schneider Electric Pelco Sarix Professional 1st generation cameras with firmware versions prior to 3.29.69, a buffer overflow vulnerability exist in cgi program "set".

item.title: CVE-2018-7781|2024-08-05T06:37:59.549Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- pelco%20sarix%20professional%20v1
item.description: In Schneider Electric Pelco Sarix Professional 1st generation cameras with firmware versions prior to 3.29.69, by sending a specially crafted request an authenticated user can view password in clear text and results in privilege escalation.
